flavorText: Dappled coats become armored hides. Soft jaws become razor tusks. Nestling play becomes the fight for survival.

foreignData.flavorText: Scheckige Pelze werden zu gepanzerten Häuten. Weiche Kiefer werden zu messerscharfen Stoßzähnen. Friedliches Spiel wird zum Kampf ums Überleben.
foreignData.name: Brutgründe
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{1}, {T}: Bewege eine Marke von einer bleibenden Karte deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, auf eine andere bleibende Karte deiner Wahl. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei.

foreignData.flavorText: Los pelajes veteados se convierten en pieles blindadas. Las fauces suaves, en colmillos afilados. Los juegos de los polluelos, en luchas por sobrevivir.
foreignData.name: Tierras de anidación
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{1}, {T}: Mueve un contador del permanente objetivo que controlas a otro permanente objetivo. Activa esto solo como un conjuro.

foreignData.flavorText: Les pelages tachetés deviennent d'épaisses cuirasses. Les mâchoires inoffensives deviennent des défenses tranchantes. Les jeux innocents deviennent une lutte pour la survie.
foreignData.name: Terrains de nidification
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{1}, {T} : Déplacez un marqueur d'un permanent ciblé que vous contrôlez sur un autre permanent ciblé. N'activez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.

foreignData.flavorText: Piumaggi maculati diventano mantelli corazzati. Dentature delicate diventano fauci affilate. I giochi nel nido diventano una lotta per la sopravvivenza.
foreignData.name: Territorio di Nidificazione
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{1}, {T}: Sposta un segnalino da un permanente bersaglio che controlli a un altro permanente bersaglio. Attiva solo come una stregoneria.

foreignData.flavorText: まだら模様の毛は強固な毛皮となる。弱い歯は鋭い牙となる。仔の遊びは生の戦いとなる。
foreignData.name: 巣ごもりの地
foreignData.text:

foreignData.flavorText: As pelugens malhadas tornam-se couraças. As mandíbulas delicadas tornam-se presas pontiagudas. As brincadeiras do ninho tornam-se uma luta pela sobrevivência.
foreignData.name: Zona de Nidificação
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{1}, {T}: Mova um marcador de uma permanente alvo que você controla para outra permanente alvo. Ative somente como um feitiço.

foreignData.flavorText: Пестрый мех сменяется на бронированную шкуру. Ленивые челюсти превращаются в острые как бритва клыки. Игры детенышей становятся битвой за выживание.

foreignData.flavorText: 花斑细绒成为厚实皮毛。软弱小嘴长出尖锐獠牙。窝中嬉闹变作生存竞争。

name: Nesting Grounds
originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Move a counter from target permanent you control onto another target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

rulings.text: You choose the two target permanents as Nesting Grounds's second ability is put onto the stack. You choose which kind of counter to move as that ability resolves.

To move a counter from one creature to another, the counter is removed from the first permanent and put on the second. Any abilities that care about a counter being removed from or put onto a permanent will apply.
If either permanent becomes an illegal target, no counter is removed or put.

The two target permanents don't have to share a type, which can result in some counters on permanents that would not occur normally, such as loyalty counters on creatures or +1/+1 counters on lands. Keyword counters will grant the permanent that keyword even if it's meaningless (such as trample on an enchantment); +1/+1 counters won't affect the permanent unless it's a creature; and many named counters (such as soul counters) won't have an effect unless the recipient permanent refers to them in some way.

text:
